accessControl.pluginDescription: Fine-grained access control for workspaces, databases, tables, fields, and rows

workspace.pluginPermissionsDescription: Control which plugins this member can use or configure.
workspace.structurePermissionsDescription: Control whether this member can create or delete databases and tables.
workspace.canCreateDatabaseDescription: Allow this member to create new databases in this workspace.
workspace.canDeleteDatabaseDescription: Allow this member to delete databases in this workspace.
workspace.canCreateTableDescription: Allow this member to create new tables in databases of this workspace.
workspace.canDeleteTableDescription: Allow this member to delete tables in databases of this workspace.
workspace.noPluginsInstalled: No plugins are installed in this workspace.

database.accessibleTablesDescription: Select which tables this member can access.
database.canCreateTableDescription: Allow this member to create new tables in this database.
database.canDeleteTableDescription: Allow this member to delete tables in this database.
database.noMembers: No members available to manage in this workspace.

table.noCollaboratingMembers: No members have collaboration access to this table. Please set up database collaboration first.
table.dataPermissionsDescription: Control how this member can interact with table data.
table.readOnlyDescription: Member can only view table data, cannot edit.
table.editableDescription: Member can view and edit table data.
table.canCreateFieldDescription: Allow this member to create new fields in this table.
table.canDeleteFieldDescription: Allow this member to delete fields in this table.

field.fieldPermissionsDescription: Control how this member can interact with this field.
field.hiddenDescription: Field is visible but content is masked, member cannot view or edit field content.
field.readOnlyDescription: Member can only view this field, cannot edit.
field.editableDescription: Member can view and edit this field.

row.permissionsDescription: Control how this member can interact with this row.
row.invisibleDescription: Row is visible but content is masked, member cannot view or edit row content.
row.readOnlyDescription: Member can only view this row, cannot edit or delete. This is the strictest permission.
row.editableDescription: Member can view, edit, and delete this row.

conditionRules.title: Condition Rules
conditionRules.description: Define rules to automatically apply row permissions based on conditions.
conditionRules.creator: Creator Match
conditionRules.noRules: No condition rules defined. Add a rule to automatically apply row permissions.
conditionRules.noCollaboratorFields: No collaborator fields available in this table.
conditionRules.priorityHint: Higher priority rules are evaluated first.
conditionRules.creatorDescription: This rule will match rows where the current user is the creator of the row.
conditionRules.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this condition rule? This action cannot be undone.

preview.title: Preview Mode
preview.previewDescription: View the table as this member would see it
preview.previewModeActive: You are viewing this table as another member. All editing is disabled.

errors.noTableAccess: You do not have access to this table
errors.rowInvisible: This row is not visible to you
